ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] I need J-boots
ygData.msgSnippet: The proper name for them are Journeyman s Boots. Basically you have to give like 3500 gold to a dwarf in Rathe Mountains along with something dropped from the
ygData.messageBody:
The proper name for them are Journeyman's Boots.
 
Basically you have to give like 3500 gold to a dwarf in Rathe Mountains along with something dropped from the ancient Cyclops and a Shadow Rapier to get the boots. 
 
Keep in mind, the only benefit of these boots is the speed.  And it's not as fast as sow.  Thee is only 1 AC on the boots and no other stat mods.
 
The effect is permanant as long as the boots are worn as far as I know, but they do not stack with sow.  In other words, if you have sow cast upon you, you wont see a noticeable change in speed with J-boots PLUS sow... you will just see the increase from the J-boots TO sow; you will run at standard sow speed, not the two combined.
 
Hope that helps.
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Robert
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 2004 11:00 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] I need J-boots

I am looking for the boots that let your character run as though she
has SOW cast on her.  I've been told to get J-Boots.  But they do not
show up in the bazaar under that name.  What is the real name of
these boots.  And do any of you know where they drop from?

Also I have an un used trial key if any one needs it.



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
